client_description.Summary Note:
The RM met Léa Manon Dumont at a yacht party in Brussels. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Léa Manon Dumont is a 22 year old and comes from Belgium.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
client_description.Family Background: Léa Manon Dumont is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description.Education Background: Léa finished secondary school at Institut des Ursulines in 2021.
client_description.Occupation History:
Léa Manon Dumont is a 22 year old and comes from Belgium.
Léa Manon Dumont did not start her professional career yet.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
She did not have any savings to invest in financial markets.
Client does not have any properties.She inherited a significant sum of 1350000 EUR from her grandfather, a respected Corporate Lawyer, in 2018, which she has wisely invested.
client_description.Client Summary: The RM is excited to help Léa navigate the challenges of starting a career and building a strong financial foundation.
